Build 20021210

When moving to latest SDK build, I exited my workspace, installed latest SDK 
and restarted.

It never successfully launches the workspace, and instead abort telling nothing:

it would complain not finding it.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9876 ***

Seems it is a dup of bug 27581. Philippe can you confirm you installed in the
same directory as previou sone and that you were using I1127 or I1126 ?
If so, this is a dup of bug 27581.

Yes, I was using 1126 installed in exact same location.

Also the complaint against core dll was:

fall back to using java.io.File functionality.



I also tried to reinstall everything and got the exact same behavior (was 
suspecting an install issue).

Got my old workspace to open by flushing my metadata .config/ folder.

Good enough for me, would this issue mean we are no able to restart a 2.0 
workspace ? Or maybe, when badness is detected then it could suggest to ignore 
the previous .config ?

Action Taken: Keep this PR, change as enhancement where we ought to provide a ui
less launcher that will chose which confirguraytion to start with: ala windows
recovery
Action Plan : pass to Update Core
